Reviews.Title: this is not a USA phone, but a european model
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Iavelli
Reviews.Content: samsung galaxy ace plus is a european model which used 900/2100 hspa freq for 3g. tmobile and Att use 1700 and 1900 hspa freq, will not work in USA on 3g networks

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: abraham
Reviews.Content: excellent product smoothly elegant and comfortable just what I needed thank you very much to do a good job then

Reviews.Title: UNSATISFIED CUSTOMER
Reviews.Author: Ingrid Guzman R.
Reviews.Content: Dear Sirs;Just to advise that recently I bought a Samsung Cel phone and package did not include user manual and ear phones. Therefore I am not fully satisfied with this purchase. Please note that this is the first time I receive a good incomplete.RegardsIngrid

Reviews.Title: Frozen and we can't get help. ..
Reviews.Author: Stacy Stojanov
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for our teenage daughter for school and everything seemed to be working fine until about 8-9 days after the enitial 30 day return policy was void....then it froze up on her and no one from Amazon wants to help. Just keep getting redirected from one place to another for tech help. All we wanted was to exchange for another one. Didn't even want a refund. I dont think l will be buying any more electronics from amazon in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Bala K.
Reviews.Content: I like it. arrived on time and the product is as advertised without any issues. Got all the accessories as well.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the performance of this phone and battery
Reviews.Author: C Luke "CL"
Reviews.Content: Good Android phone with plenty of memory and performs well.  I wish it came with a standard US charger but the adapter it came with worked fine.

Reviews.Title: Solid Samsung Unlocked phone
Reviews.Author: Lisa Rome
Reviews.Content: This phone performs better than earlier models and smoothly runs Android Apps without any added memory.  Screen is clear and easy to use.  Speaker is kinda quiet when not in speakerphone mode.  Wifi and data capes are good enough though sometimes it seems to hang up when pulling downloads or email updates.

Reviews.Title: Not worth a fraction of the cost.
Reviews.Author: redbone
Reviews.Content: I should have sent it back immediately when right out the box the charger did not work. And things just went down hill from there. I was not able to set up text/picturing, It dropped calls and the bad news goes on and on.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: edina
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my mom, great phone. Works fine in Uzbekistan. The only thing that frustrates is when she texts me via text messages in cyrillic, in the States I receive a scripted text, like this "????". But when she texts me via whats app in same cyrillic, I am able to read it

Reviews.Title: Samsung GT-S7500 Galaxy Ace Plus Unlocked GSM Cell Phone Andriod
Reviews.Author: Ingrid Martinez
Reviews.Content: but the phone did not come, not what caused this rate I that I repaid the money almost immediately, thank you very much for the excellent service!

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: HUES
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my brohter and until today he has been very happy about this phone, he is out of the country so before sending the phone I had the chance to verify that everything was OK, and I think it has everything that a smartphone offer.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Daniel Alvarado
Reviews.Content: excellent product what I expected. correct size and adequate measures without complaint very well delivered on time thanks you so much

Reviews.Title: as expected
Reviews.Author: kingsley
Reviews.Content: it,s up to my expectation .i really like the phone and i,m getting use to it .i will recommend it to anyone interested in buying it

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: gerardo
Reviews.Content: excellent product and fast as it as I wanted thank you very much for everything I hope to buy more in your store

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Sahar El-Sheneity
Reviews.Content: My daughter ordered this phone. It is a nice android smart phone. Good sound quality, light, has nice color and shape. The software and reliability are fine so far.

Reviews.Title: Do not work well on 3G.
Reviews.Author: Luis F Arellano
Reviews.Content: First didn't came with earphones, last don't work well with 3G, that's why I choose just two stars. I don't like it.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: maulene
Reviews.Content: galaxy ace plus is an ok phone but the battery runs down really quickly of your a constant user... and it lags a bit sometimes

Reviews.Title: Its okay!
Reviews.Author: Thyago Leão
Reviews.Content: It is a good device. The screen is small, but for those looking for something portable ... this is the appliance.

Reviews.Title: This a good smart phone for a beginner.
Reviews.Author: Jajing
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone, although accessing the internet can be time delaying. What I do not like about it is that screen keeps going dark and have to push the button on the side to reactivate it.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG GT S7500 - IT.HAS NOT CAMARE FOR CHATTING INSTINCTIVELY
Reviews.Author: LIDA MARTELL ONEGLIO
Reviews.Content: I choose this camera for the pricebut the dots it has  on the samsung thought it was the other eye of camera but then discovered that are just sensors ... I don liked itif he had seen or read the technical guide realizing I wouldalso you mentioned neither but anyway I can no longer return. for the next timeand if I will recomended  to my family first but I would say beware of carmera details from there all right.

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Jose Morales
Reviews.Content: Is a small cellphone but powerfull, have a GPS and 1 GHZ processor, can update to Jelly bean, i love this cell phone

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: The screen and overall usability were both far better than expected. It's difficult to find a case that fits so best to order that online at the same time. Great choice for a smartphone on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Fancy phone
Reviews.Author: Reuters70
Reviews.Content: It's a fancy phone, multiple applications, easy to use, nice design and let me stay in touch with my friends an news  trought social networks...

Reviews.Title: SI REVISION TODAVIA DEL ARTICULO
Reviews.Author: nestor
Reviews.Content: EN LO QUE LO TENGA LES CALIFICO MUY BIEN LA ENTREGA A  TIEMPO EN LA DIRECCION QUE LE ENVIE MUY PRONTO ME LLEGARA A DISTINO

Reviews.Title: fine
Reviews.Author: raul perez
Reviews.Content: The packaging is excellent perfect thank you very muchrecommended the product is of very good quality, is all that I expected of it, is a product that I recommend to all the amazon community.I recommend it very appropriate material is expected in this type of product

Reviews.Title: me llego en excelente estado y muy rapido
Reviews.Author: yorleny montero solozano
Reviews.Content: Muy lindo mandemén diseños de protectores para es una marca muy buena gracias me gusto mucho  lo rrapido que me llego

Reviews.Title: Telefono
Reviews.Author: Carlos Salas "Ironman 75"
Reviews.Content: Fue un regalo para mi madre y estamos enteramente satisfechos, llego tal cual fue descrito y se ajusta a nuestras necesidades

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Fernando Solis
Reviews.Content: I like the service was great, I called to be resend it because it was lost on the mail but  they did quickly

Reviews.Title: beautiful
Reviews.Author: Tessy
Reviews.Content: I sent it to my sister in Nigeria and she was like """mehn!!!!! this phone is machine"""""lol. gud phone indeed.

Reviews.Title: Sound an issue out of the box
Reviews.Author: DEDRA CAGLE "Reading is one of my hobbies. It...
Reviews.Content: Not only did I have issues with the sound - either no sound or distorted sound, I could not register this phone on the US Samsung site because it didn't recognize it.Reconsider phone choice.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900MHz frequencies and 3G Network HSDPA 900/2100MHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
Android 2.3 (Gingerbread); 5MP Camera, 2592x1944 pixels with autofocus and LED flash; GPS, with A-GPS Support; MP3/MP4 Player; Document editor; Image editor; Google Aplications; Calendar; Picasa integration and Predictive text input (Swype).
3.65" TFT Capacitive Touchscreen, 320x480 pixels; 3GB Internal Storage, 512MB RAM; HTML Browser, Adobe Flash; JAVA via Java MIDP emulator; Qualcomm Snapdragon S1 Chipset; 1Ghz Processor; Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, DLNA, Wi-Fi hotspot and Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP.
Talk time Up to 11 h (2G) / Up to 7 h 20 min (3G)- Standby Up to Up to 670 h (2G) / Up to 420 h (3G)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung GT-S7500 Galaxy Ace Plus Unlocked GSM Cell Phone Andriod International Version/Warranty White
